data.name: Driven
data.description:
Immersive first person racing on the Meta Quest 2 & 3.

Compete against AI to gain credits to purchase cars and gain access to races. Win the race to be added to the Global Leaderboards.

Take part in Time Trials - navigate obstacles and get the fastest time on the Global Leaderboard.

Challenging Race Series - take part in a number of races to win the Race Series - 30 Race Series in total

150 races to complete
30 cars to collect
Multiplayer 

Driven is a physics-based "simcade" racing game incorporating realistic car-handling and aerodynamics.

Virtual steering and automatic or manual transmission.

2 AI difficulty levels - extra credits awarded for racing against Pro AI.

Updated graphics for Quest 3

New Damage feature


Take to the track and have fun!

changelog.change_log:
New Features
- Multiplayer Damage.  Room creator can enable damage for multiplayer race
- Race Series Damage.  If Damage is enabled during Race Series, player can buy engine repair before next race

Bug fixes and optimisations.

16 new Highland Time Trials

Bug fixes and optimisations
Multiplayer fix

Damage!

New feature enabled in Settings
Damage amount is based on collision force and proximity to engine
When enabled extra race credits are awarded
Drive carefully as Damage affects engine power

Race Series Update

For the first race cars are placed in random start order - subsequent races cars are in reverse Race Series order

Various other bug fixes and graphical updates

Improved race loading times

Updates to Highland track

Bug fixes

Quest 2 graphics update

Choose between 2D, 3D (or both) spectators in the Settings menu
Multiplayer fix

Spectators

Quest 3 Enhancements

General optimisations

New Feature - Race Series -
  Take part in 3-race and 5-race Series.  Win the Series to enter the Global Leaderboard!

Quest 3 Enhancements -
  Dynamic shadows - higher quality textures and 90Hz refresh rate

New Environment - Highland
24 new races

# NEW FEATURE - LAP TIMES
Lap times are now shown in-car and stored locally for each race

- **UPDATED TABLES**
Post-race info tables have been given a face lift

- **AI**
AI are now more aware of the players position and will ease off the gas when getting too close.

- **PHYSICS**
Cars have a more realistic drag coefficient - this can make slipstreaming feel more pronounced

Various other graphics and audio updates

# NEW FEATURE - SLIPSTREAM
Riding in opponents slipstream results in less drag, providing a slight performance boost

- **UPDATED SCUBA**
Scuba interior restored
Scuba turbo volume increased

- **BACKFIRE**
Exhaust backfire particles updated
Exhaust backfire no longer lights up the car interior

- **STEERING**
Decreased steering sensitivity at high speeds - allows more accuracy and requires more input from player (virtual steering only)

- **SETTINGS**
Option to disable/enable Drift Assist globally

- **PHYSICS**
Slight tweaks to improve feel of game

Various other graphics, FX updates

Drift Assist -
New feature - Toggle by pushing right thumbstick up
Setting is saved by car
Suits some cars better than others (e.g. RWD)

Pickup Interior Improved

Snow level - better trees, new features

Fixed bug in Lobby Menu

Various other updates

NEW TRACK, BETTER CAR INTERIORS

- **DEMO TRACK**
The Demo Track has been carried over from the Driven Demo

- **CAR INTERIORS**
More detailed car interiors

- **Others** 
Various graphical, audio and FX updates

#  PHYSICS UPDATES, AI UPDATES AND NEW MENU

- **PHYSICS**
AI collisions are less impactful

- **AI**
AI are now more aware of the players position and will be more reactive to avoid colliding

- **MAIN MENU**
Graphical refresh and less linear navigation

- **BARRELS**
Barrels have now been removed - they were causing too many problems with collisions and spoiling gameplay

- **Others** 
Various graphical, audio and FX updates

I hope these updates improve your experience - please let me have any constructive criticisms you may have...

New loading screen to improve game start-up time

Improvement to physics to give cars a greater sense of weight 
Reduce car spin when airborne

Racing AI updates
AI updated to be less aggressive in Pro mode

Various graphical, audio and FX updates
Profile Resetting bugfix

MORE NEW RACES AND BOOST!!!

There are now 122 races to take part in!

A new boost feature provides 30 seconds of boost per race.  The boost option will appear before the race and costs 200 credits per race.

To activate boost press the right thumbstick.

New sound effects and a couple of FX tweaks.

Cheers!

Installation issue fix

4 new Time Trial races which brings the total number of single player races to 100!

Added new option to Settings menu - Smooth Turn In Lobby.  Enabling this allows, you guessed it, smooth turning when navigating the Lobby.

Couple of bug fixes.
